mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, author_id, is_pinned, view_count, created_at, updated_at FROM notices ORDER BY is_pinned DESC, created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (title, content, author_id, is_pinned) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{authorId}, #{isPinned})
mapper.update: UPDATE notices SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
